inclusion.criterion: Male or female patients > 18 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Detectable plasma HCV-RNA by qualitative PCR assay.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Documented recurrent hepatitis C by liver biopsy within the past year.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative urine pregnancy test before initiating the treatment for women of childbearing potential.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness of the patient and all potentially childbearing partners to use a reliable form of effective contraception during the study, unless the patient or partner is surgically sterile or post-menopausal.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to undergo provide informed consent and comply with study requirements.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or breast-feeding.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of co-infection with HIV or hepatitis B.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is on lactulose and follow-up as an outpatient to work up the increase in AFP.
